ygData.subject: Re: need help jewlrycrafting
ygData.msgSnippet: Enchanted silver can be purchased from vendors? Can you give a clue as to where. Every enchanter I talk to wants at least 6g/bar to enchant. At that rate, I ll
ygData.messageBody:
Enchanted silver can be purchased from vendors? Can you give a clue as to where.
Every enchanter I talk to wants at least 6g/bar to enchant. At that rate, I'll
save money buying from vendors.

Jeffrey D. Hayes wrote:

> From: "Jeffrey D. Hayes" <jhayes@...>
>
> Sorry, enchanters are it. But, I understand that you can buy enchanted
> silver from teh enchanters for about 1plat a bar. Unfortunately, this is
> not a get rich quick scheme. I am currently working with a jewelsmith (who
> is an enchanter). So far, we have invested 100 platinum into his education.
> I expect that we will spend in excess of 500 platinum before he is truly
> profitable.
>
> Denas the Wandering Bard
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kleit@... [mailto:kleit@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 12:48 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] need help jewlrycrafting
>
> From: kleit@...
>
> can some jewels and metal combos make magic effects without enchanting? if
> so let me know. i am trying to make some money. thank you brother bards
> Olczyk of Qeynos on tarew marr
>
